language.heading: Choose your language
language.description: This will be the language in which your app will be displayed, and can be changed at any time from the More Section of the application.

polling_stations.heading: Monitor election processes
polling_stations.description: and report campaign irregularities, polling station issues, and flag any problems with voting day procedures

forms.heading: Fill in observation forms
forms.description: and submit reports for each monitoring stage to help ensure a transparent and fair electoral process

media.heading: Add notes or media files
media.description: to further support your observations and provide evidence for any irregularities

select_app_mode.heading: Select app mode
select_app_mode.description: You can monitor the electoral process as an accredited observer, or just as a citizen interested in supporting fair and democratic elections.

accredited_observer.title: Vote Monitor for Accredited Observers
accredited_observer.description: I am an accredited independent observer, invited by an NGO to observe the electoral process. **

citizen.title: Vote Monitor for Citizens
citizen.description: I am a citizen and I want to report electoral irregularities I see during the electoral campaign or on election day.

select_app_mode.helper: **As an accredited observer you will be able to switch to Citizen mode at any time, from the app’s menu.

select_election_event.heading: Available election events
select_election_event.description: Select the event for which you would like to submit a report for:
select_election_event.empty_description: At this moment there are no active electoral events for which you can report incidents as a citizen. Once an event will be available, you will see it in this section.
select_election_event.error_description: Something went wrong while retrieving the available election events. Please retry.

citizen_report_issue.description: As a citizen, you can report an election-related issue, by filling-in a reporting form, from the list below.
citizen_report_issue.empty_forms: Reporting forms will appear here once Vote Monitor team will publish them in the system.
citizen_report_issue.error_message: Something went wrong while retrieving the reporting forms. Please retry.

info_modal.p1: Reports submitted through Vote Monitor Citizen will be analysed by the NGOs monitoring the election event, and may be included in electoral observation reports. In certain cases, your reports may be forwarded to the institutions responsible for organising elections in order to improve future election processes.
info_modal.p2: Please note that submitting a report through this application does not constitute an official complaint filed with the institutions responsible for organising elections.

review.heading: Review your report
review.sending_report: We're sending your report. Please wait...

success.title: Your report has been successfuly sent!
success.description: Thank you for your civic involvement. You have the option to send a copy of your responses to your email, or you can return to the main page.

citizen_form.error: There was a problem while sending your review.

email_copy.title: Enter your email to receive a form copy
email_copy.description: To receive a copy of your form, please enter your email address below. This email address will be used only to send you the copy and will not be stored or used for any other purpose.
email_copy.invalid: The email format is not valid

copy_sent.title: Your copy has been sent
copy_sent.description: Your copy should arrive instantly, but in rare occasions it may take a few minutes to process. You can return to the main page in the meantime.

unsaved_changes_dialog.title: You have unsaved changes
unsaved_changes_dialog.description: Leaving this page will cause all your progress on the form to be lost. Are you sure you wish to go back?

disclaimer.paragraph1: Vote Monitor Observer can only be used by independent observers, accredited by an organisation which monitors election processes. An invitation email from your organisation is needed, with instructions to set up an account.
disclaimer.paragraph2: If you are not an accredited observer, you may still report irregularities as a citizen for an ongoing election event, without needing an account.

login.heading: Log in
login.paragraph: Please use the email address with which you registered as an independent observer:

errors.invalid_credentials: There was an error with your credentials. Please try again.
errors.offline: You need an internet connection in order to log in.

login.email_toast: Email address was copied to clipboard

forgot_password.heading: Forgot your password?
forgot_password.paragraph: Please enter the email address associated with your account and we’ll send you a link to reset your password.

errors.invalid_email: The current email is not registered in the system. Please try again.

confirmation.heading: Email sent
confirmation.paragraph: Check your email and open the link we sent to continue. Check your spam filter if you did not receive the email.

about_app.title: About Vote Monitor
about_app.general: Vote Monitor is a dedicated digital tool for independent observers and international organizations engaged in election monitoring. Vote Monitor is developed and managed by Code for Romania/Commit Global.
about_app.purpose: The app assists independent observers in monitoring polling stations and documenting the polling process in real-time for a specific election round. All data collected through the mobile app is sent in real-time to accrediting organizations to identify potential red flags that may indicate fraud or other irregularities. Ultimately, our goal is to provide a clear, simple, and realistic snapshot of the polling process proceedings.

app_provides.item1: A way to manage multiple visited polling stations
app_provides.item2: An efficient method to monitor the flow of the polling process through forms set up by accrediting organizations
app_provides.item3: A means of quickly reporting other problematic issues outside the standard forms

about_app.usage: The Vote Monitor App can be used during any type of election in any country worldwide. Since 2016, it has been used in multiple election rounds in Romania, Poland and Bulgaria.

about_app_citizen.title: About Vote Monitor
about_app_citizen.p1: Vote Monitor Citizen enables everyday citizens to actively participate in monitoring elections by reporting any irregularities they encounter during the electoral period, including campaign activities, polling station operations, and voting day procedures.
about_app_citizen.p2: Vote Monitor Citizen is an extension of the Vote Monitor app, which was initially developed by Code for Romania/Commit Global for independent observers working alongside NGOs in election monitoring efforts.
about_app_citizen.p3: Users can submit real-time reports that will be analysed by non-governmental organizations involved in the electoral process. These reports may contribute to detailed observation documents and, in some instances, could be forwarded to relevant institutions to improve future elections.
about_app_citizen.p4: While citizen reports play a vital role in promoting transparency, please note that submitting a report through this app does not constitute an official complaint to the institutions responsible for organizing elections.

loading_screen.heading: Loading...
loading_screen.paragraph: We are preparing all the data, please wait!

no_election_round.heading: No election event to observe yet
no_election_round.paragraph: You will be able to use the app once you will be assigned to an election event by your organization

no_visited_polling_stations.heading: No visited polling stations yet
no_visited_polling_stations.paragraph: Start configuring your first polling station before completing observation forms.

my_polling_stations.heading: My polling stations
my_polling_stations.paragraph: You can switch between polling stations if you want to revisit form answers or polling station information.

error.arrival_first: Please select an arrival time first.
error.later_departure: Please select a departure time that is at a later time than the arrival.
error.earlier_arrival: Please select an arrival time that is at an earlier time than the departure.
error.server: We couldn't send the information to the server.

observation_time.departure_after_arrival: The departure time must be after the arrival time

clear.title: Clear observation time
clear.description: This action will delete your arrival and departure time, including all your breaks entered so far for this polling station. To avoid unintended information loss, please ensure you check the times before performing this action.

delete.title: Delete break
delete.description: This action will delete your break. To avoid unintended information loss, please ensure you check the times before performing this action.

unsaved_changes.title: Save changes to observation time
unsaved_changes.description: You have unsaved changes related to the observation time you entered. Do you want to save your changes before leaving the page?

unable_to_save.title: Unable to Save Observation Time
unable_to_save.p1: The times you entered cannot be saved due to a conflict between the break periods and the arrival/departure times.
unable_to_save.p2: Please ensure that break periods do not exceed the time interval defined by the arrival and departure observation times. Please review and adjust the times accordingly.

polling_station_form.paragraph: Answer a few quick questions about the polling station.

list.empty: Observation forms will appear here once your organization will publish them in the system.

error.paragraph2: We could not fetch the data. Press the retry button to try again!

select_language_modal.helper: The selected form is available in multiple languages. Please select which one you would like to continue with.
select_language_modal.error: Please select one of the options

warning_modal.title: Clear Polling station information form
warning_modal.description: This action will delete all answers entered so far for this form. To avoid unintended information loss, please ensure you check the form before performing this action.

unsaved_changes_dialog.title: Save changes to form
unsaved_changes_dialog.description: You have unsaved changes on this form. Do you want to save your changes before leaving?

form_overview.error: Error while loading the form data!

description.p1: This action will delete all answers entered so far for this form (including notes and media files). Status of all questions will be reverted to 'Not Answered'.
description.p2: To avoid unintended information loss, please ensure you check the form before performing this action

form.min: The field must be at least {{value}} characters long
form.max: The field must have a maximum of {{value}} characters

upload.offline: You need an internet connection in order to perform this action.

input.placeholder: Add any relevant notes to this question.

delete.title: Delete note
delete.description: This action cannot be undone. Once deleted, a note cannot be retrieved.

question.title: Clear answer to question {{value}}
question.description: Clearing the answer to this question will permanently delete all its information (including notes and media files), as well as all its connected questions. Question statuses will be reverted to Not Answered.

attachment.title: Delete media file
attachment.description: This action cannot be undone. Once deleted, a media file cannot be retrieved.

unsaved_answer.title: Save changes to question
unsaved_answer.description: You have unsaved changes on this question. Do you want to save your changes before leaving?

warning_dialog.title: Remove Polling station #{{value}}
warning_dialog.description: This action will remove the polling station from your list of visited polling stations. You can add it again through the Add New Polling Station process.

removal_unallowed_dialog.title: Removing polling station #{{value}} not allowed
removal_unallowed_dialog.description: The polling station cannot be removed from your list because it contains data (Polling station information and/or Form answers) which cannot be deleted by the system on your behalf. If you want to remove this polling station, please clear polling station information and form answers manually, then retry this action.

manage_my_polling_stations.delete_error: We encountered a problem while deleting the polling station visit. Please try again.
manage_my_polling_stations.offline_error_toast_msg: You need an internet connection in order to perform this action.

list.title: Quick Report
list.heading: My reported issues
list.empty: Start sending quick reports to the organization if you notice irregularities inside, outside the polling station or whenever needed.

info_modal.p1: From this section, you can quickly report any electoral irregularities you observe at polling stations or nearby areas.
info_modal.p2: This feature allows you to alert the organization instantly, outside the regular observation forms, ensuring urgent issues are addressed promptly.

upload.offline: You need an internet connection in order to perform this action.

polling_station_id.label: Polling station *
polling_station_id.extra: Please write here some identification details for this polling station (such as address, name, number, etc.)

options.not_related: Not related to a polling station

options.UnauthorizedPersonsAtPollingStation: Unauthorized person(s) at the polling station
options.IllegalRestrictionOfVotersRightToVote: Illegal restriction of voter's right to vote
options.ViolationsRelatedToControlPaper: Violations related to the control paper
options.NotCheckingVoterIdentificationSafeguardM: Not checking the voter identification safeguard measures
options.VotingWithoutVoterIdentificationSafeguar: Voting without voter identification safeguard measures
options.ViolationsRelatedToMobileBallotBox: Violations related to the mobile ballot box
options.NumberOfBallotsExceedsNumberOfVoters: Number of ballots exceed the number of voters
options.FalsificationOrImproperCorrectionOfFinal: Falsification/improper correction of the final protocol
options.RefusalToIssueCopyOfFinalProtocolOrIssui: Refusal to issue a copy of the final protocol/issuing an improper copy
options.ImproperFillingInOfFinalProtocol: Improper filling in of the final protocol
options.ViolationOfSealingProceduresOfElectionMa: Violation of the sealing procedures of the election materials
options.ViolationsRelatedToVoterLists: Violations related to the voter lists

polling_station_details.label: Polling station details *
polling_station_details.placeholder: Please write here some identification details for this polling station (such as address, name, number, etc.)

issue_title.label: Title of issue *
issue_title.placeholder: Write a title for the issue.
issue_title.required: Title of the issue is required

issue_description.label: Description *
issue_description.placeholder: Describe the situation in detail here.
issue_description.required: Description of the issue is required

guides.title: Resources

empty.heading: No guides to read yet
empty.paragraph: Guides and resources from your organization at your hands.

guides.info_modal: In this section, expect to have key information and resources designed to help you observe electoral processes and report any electoral issues or irregularities you encounter as an independent observer.

resources.title: Resources
resources.info: In this section, expect to have key information and resources designed to help you observe electoral processes and report any electoral issues or irregularities you encounter as a citizen.

empty.heading: No guides to read yet
empty.paragraph: Guides and resources about observing electoral processes and reporting issues as a citizen at your hands.

empty.heading: No message received yet
empty.paragraph: Push messages and alerts from your organization will appear here.

info_modal.p1: In this Inbox expect to receive live updates and messages from the NGO that accredited you as an observer.
info_modal.p2: Check back periodically to see if you have received any new information, relevant to your observation activity.

empty.heading: No updates received yet
empty.paragraph: Updates about electoral period will appear here.

info_modal.p1: In this section expect to receive live updates from the Vote Monitor team regarding election period relevant to you as a citizen interested in civic engagement.
info_modal.p2: Check back periodically to see if you have received any new information.

logout_offline.title: Attention: You have unsynced data
logout_offline.description:
You are currently offline. If you log out now, any forms, attachments, or notes you have completed or uploaded during the offline mode will be lost.

To avoid losing your data, please reconnect to the internet before logging out.

logout_online.title: Are you sure you want to logout?

feedback_toast.offline: You need an internet connection in order to perform this action.

feedback_sheet.heading: Send us your feedback
feedback_sheet.p1: Please tell us about any issues you might have encountered with the functioning of the app, or any suggestions you would like to share to improve Vote Monitor for the future. We appreciate every feedback!

confirmation.heading: Password changed!
confirmation.paragraph: Your password has been successfully changed.

error.offline: App is offline and cannot do the request

generic_error_screen.paragraph2: We could not recover after this error. Please check your internet connection and restart the application!

network_banner.online: App online. All answers sent to server.
network_banner.offline_citizen: Offline mode. You need internet to submit the form.
network_banner.offline_warning: It looks like you're currently offline. Don't worry, your answers are safely stored locally and will be synced with our servers once your connection is restored. Feel free to continue filling out the observation forms and submitting quick reports.
network_banner.offline_warning_citizen: It looks like you're currently offline. In order to submit the form, you need to be online.

sync.warning: Please DO NOT CLOSE the app or the internet connection or the data will be lost.
sync.files: We are uploading your files, it may take a while...
